textBox.richText: In California, tenth grade world history courses are usually begun by a review of the foundations of world civilization. This enormous topic is then reduced, by necessity, to a quick overview of global religions and a summary of the European Enlightenment. I have put together a list of books on these topics, on the page Bibliography of Intellectual & Ethical Foundations of the Modern Era, and I plan to add to it more global perspectives as I find them and as they are suggested to me.
